title: Allow global hotkeys to launch UWP Apps
body: Allow UWP apps to register a shortcut like [ctrl] + [F3] with the system.

comments.body: Marvin, I'll reopen it but highly suggest you file it in Windows Feedback as well.
As a developer I feel like this is a developer feature. Apps would need to know with which hotkey they where launched and also could respond differently to different hotkeys.
